1.text: And Benjamin begot Bela his first-born, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third;

2.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

3.text: And Bela had sons, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud;

4.text: and Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah;

5.text: and Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

6.text: And these are the sons of Ehud—these are the heads of fathers’ houses of the inhabitants of Geba, and they were carried captive to Manahath;

7.text: and Naaman, and Ahijah, and Gera, were they that carried them captive—and he begot Uzza, and Ahihud.

8.text: And Shaharaim begot children in the field of Moab, after he had sent them away, to wit, Hushim and Baara his wives;

9.text: he begot of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcam;

10.text: and Jeuz, and Sachiah, and Mirmah. These were his sons, heads of fathers’ houses.

11.text: and of Hushim he begot Abitub, and Elpaal.

12.text: And the sons of Elpaal: Eber, and Misham, and Shemed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof;

13.text: and Beriah, and Shema, who were heads of fathers’ houses of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who put to flight the inhabitants of Gath.

15.text: and Zebadiah, and Arad, and Eder;

16.text: and Michael, and Ishpah, and Joha, were the sons of Beriah.

17.text: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hizki, and Heber;

18.text: and Ishmerai, and Izliah, and Jobab, were the sons of Elpaal.

19.text: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi;

20.text: and Elienai, and Zillethai, and Eliel;

21.text: and Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, were the sons of Shimei.

22.text: And Ishpan, and Ebed, and Eliel;

23.text: and Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan;

24.text: and Hananiah, and Elam, and Anthothiah;

25.text: and Iphdeiah, and Penuel, were the sons of Shashak.

26.text: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah;

27.text: and Jaareshiah, and Elijah, and Zichri, were the sons of Jeroham.

28.text: These were heads of fathers’ houses throughout their generations, chief men; these dwelt in Jerusalem.

29.text: And in Gibeon there dwelt the father of Gibeon [, Jeiel], whose wife’s name was Maacah;

30.text: and his first-born son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab;

31.text: and Gedor, and Ahio, and Zecher.

32.text: And Mikloth begot Shimeah. And they also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against their brethren.

33.text: And Ner begot Kish; and Kish begot Saul; and Saul begot Jonathan, and Malchi-shua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.

34.text: And the son of Jonathan was Merib-baal; and Merib-baal begot Micah.

35.text: And the sons of Micah; Pithon, and Melech, and Taarea, and Ahaz.

36.text: And Ahaz begot Jehoaddah; and Jehoaddah begot Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza;

37.text: and Moza begot Binea; Raphah was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

38.text: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these: Azrikam, Bocru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.

39.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother: Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.

40.text: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers; and had many sons, and sons’ sons, a hundred and fifty. All these were of the sons of Benjamin.
